briefTitle: Study of the Effect of Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine (PCV) on Immunogenicity of Pentacel™
officialTitle: Immunogenicity Assessment of Pentacel™ (Hybrid CP20/20/5/3DT-mIPV//PRP-T) When Given at Different Times From or Concurrently With a Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine
summary:
This study is designed to evaluate in a controlled manner the effect of Prevnar® on the immune responses of Pentacel™

Primary Objective - Stage I:

To compare the immune responses elicited by an infant series of Pentacel™ when given at different times from or concurrently with a Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (Prevnar®).

Primary Objective - Stage II:

To compare the immune responses elicited by a 4th dose of Pentacel™ when given at different times from or concurrently with Prevnar®.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With 4-fold Rises in Levels of Pentacel™ Vaccine Antibody Titers Post-dose 3 When Given at Different Times or Concurrently With a Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine (Prevnar®)
